page.title: 17SECOND WOOD FARM.
page.content: We visited Second Wood Farm because it is owned by the parents of Simon Cook from our class.It has 557 acres of land,and about 100 acres is wood- land.There are 40 cows which are a mixture including Friesian, Hereford, Aberdeen Angus,and Charolais,and a four year old Blond Aquitaine bull weighing about 3 tons.The calves are all cross breeds,and are kept for a year before being sold.They also grow crops;wheat for animal feed and flour; barley for feed and malting;oats for feeding and porridge;peas to be pro- cessed;linseed for oil or margarine and triticale. Mrs Cook explained the farmer's year and all the machinery they need to use like harrows,ploughs,seed drills, fertiliser spreader,sprayers,tractors, a combine harvester and an assortment of trailers.
